5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: Kathir bin ‘Abdullah bin ‘Amr bin ‘Awf narrated, from his father, from his grandfather, that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said the Takbir in the ‘Eid prayers, seven times in the first Rak’ah and five times in the second

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَمْ يُكَبِّرُ الإِمَامُ فِي صَلاَةِ الْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning how many times the Imam should say the Takbir in the Eid Prayers
